remarks: Associate RHS addition-subtraction.  (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 15-Oct-2018.)
statement:
assraddsubd.1 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
assraddsubd.2 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
assraddsubd.3 $e |- ( ph -> D e. CC ) $.
assraddsubd.4 $e |- ( ph -> A = ( ( B + C ) - D ) ) $.
assraddsubd $p |- ( ph -> A = ( B + ( C - D ) ) ) $.
